content:
Experience classic New York hospitality the way it is meant to be; current yet timeless, sophisticated yet spontaneous, with an indulgence of all that is fine, fashionable and fun.

The WestHouse Hotel New York Best Rate Guarantee ensures you receive the best possible rate when booking through our website, reservations line, or via the hotel directly.

The WestHouse Hotel is ADA compliant under the Department of Justice ADA Title III Regulation 28 CFR Part 36, 1991. For information about accessible features, please view our Accessibility Statement.
